participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: cynical and frustrated, but deep down seeks understanding and connection.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. i'm 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i am planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: resilient and empathetic, often reflecting on her past but determined to move forward.
participant_2.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

content.text: When i was young, my mother passed away.Do your parents still alive?
